app_details.title: Pesa (Formerly Pesapeer)
app_details.description:
Send and receive money globally, in time and without any fees.

Imagine a smaller world. Zero financial restrictions and all the possibilities. Your Pesa account gives you access to instant money transfers in life’s crucial moments.

Manage multiple currency wallets and save your money and time when you send money in 5 minutes or less, with no transaction fees and exchange rates that don’t bite.

Send & Receive Money
Set up your Pesa account in minutes and join thousands of users sending and receiving money internationally with ease, at zero cost and the absolute best exchange rates in the market.
Send money to Kenya, Ghana, the United Kingdom, the EU, Nigeria, India, the Philippines, and many more countries.

Zero fee Money transfers
Enjoy free money transfers from Canada, Nigeria and the UK to over 50 countries. Your international money transfers will be at no cost when you send with Pesa. Zero transfer fees and no hidden fees. Experience all the freedom when you send with Pesa.

Manage multiple currencies
Effortlessly hold and transfer funds in various currencies. Experience the convenience of seamlessly managing currencies at the best rates and sending money globally from anywhere in the world. With the flexibility of exchanging at the best rates and sending money globally, regardless of your location, our platform provides easy access to multi-currency transfers. You can send money from CAD (Canadian Dollar) to INR (Indian Rupee), NGN (Nigerian Naira), PHP (Philippines Peso), GBP (Great British Pounds), GHS (Ghanaian Cedi), KES (Kenyan Shilling), UGX (Ugandan Shilling), EUR (Euro) and many more.

Earn with Pesa
Take advantage of Pesa referral and start earning extra cash for getting people to #sendwithpesa. By inviting your friends to use Pesa for their cross border money transfers, you can earn unlimited cash. Join the thousands of satisfied users in Canada and the UK who are already enjoying the benefits of borderless payments with no fees on Pesa. Don't miss out on this opportunity to earn while helping your friends discover a more convenient and seamless way to send money globally. Download the app and share your unique link!
Seamlessly convert currencies
Join thousands of people experiencing the convenience of Pesa. Send money from Canada, the Uk and Nigeria to India, Ghana, France, Kenya, and more with ease and for free.

Dare to go further
Take the opportunity to explore the world and Pesa will be with you. Helping you stay connected to places you love with instant international money transfers.
**Here’s why you need a Pesa account**
- Live internationally and make transfers like a local
- Hold and manage multiple currencies in one account
- Never worry about hefty transfer fees or frustrating processes. Enjoy free transfers with every transaction when you send money abroad with Pesa.
- Seamlessly convert your currencies on the go
- Always safe. Always secure.
- Track your transactions. Stay updated with instant notifications on your transactions. If you ever need assistance, you can send a mail to support@pesa.co or use the in-app chat option.
Pesa LLC is registered and regularized in Canada by the Financial Transactions and Report Analysis Center of Canada as a Money Service Business. Rn: M20300281.
Pesa LLC is also registered in the United States as a Money Service Business with the United States Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN). Rn: 31000231722151.

Your transactions are secure and our facial verification and password encrypted platform, security and fraud monitoring tools keep your personal information safe.

Send and receive money globally, in time and without any fees.

Imagine a smaller world. Zero financial restrictions and all the possibilities. Your Pesa account gives you access to instant money transfers in life’s crucial moments.

Manage multiple currency wallets and save your money and time when you send money in 5 minutes or less, with no transaction fees and exchange rates that don’t bite.

Set up your Pesa account in minutes and join thousands of users sending and receiving money internationally with ease, at zero cost and the absolute best exchange rates in the market.
Send money to Kenya, Ghana, the United Kingdom, the EU, Nigeria, India, the Philippines, and many more countries.

Zero fee Money transfers
Enjoy free money transfers from Canada, Nigeria and the UK to over 50 countries. Your international money transfers will be at no cost when you send with Pesa. Zero transfer fees and no hidden fees. Experience all the freedom when you send with Pesa.

Manage multiple currencies
Effortlessly hold and transfer funds in various currencies. Experience the convenience of seamlessly managing currencies at the best rates and sending money globally from anywhere in the world. With the flexibility of exchanging at the best rates and sending money globally, regardless of your location, our platform provides easy access to multi-currency transfers. You can send money from CAD (Canadian Dollar) to INR (Indian Rupee), NGN (Nigerian Naira), PHP (Philippines Peso), GBP (Great British Pounds), GHS (Ghanaian Cedi), KES (Kenyan Shilling), UGX (Ugandan Shilling), EUR (Euro) and many more.

Earn with Pesa
Take advantage of Pesa referral and start earning extra cash for getting people to #sendwithpesa. By inviting your friends to use Pesa for their cross border money transfers, you can earn unlimited cash. Join the thousands of satisfied users in Canada and the UK who are already enjoying the benefits of borderless payments with no fees on Pesa. Don't miss out on this opportunity to earn while helping your friends discover a more convenient and seamless way to send money globally. Download the app and share your unique link!
Seamlessly convert currencies
Join thousands of people experiencing the convenience of Pesa. Send money from Canada, the Uk and Nigeria to India, Ghana, France, Kenya, and more with ease and for free.

Dare to go further
Take the opportunity to explore the world and Pesa will be with you. Helping you stay connected to places you love with instant international money transfers.
**Here’s why you need a Pesa account**
- Live internationally and make transfers like a local
- Hold and manage multiple currencies in one account
- Never worry about hefty transfer fees or frustrating processes. Enjoy free transfers with every transaction when you send money abroad with Pesa.

- Track your transactions. Stay updated with instant notifications on your transactions. If you ever need assistance, you can send a mail to support@pesa.co or use the in-app chat option.
Pesa LLC is registered and regularized in Canada by the Financial Transactions and Report Analysis Center of Canada as a Money Service Business. Rn: M20300281.
Pesa LLC is also registered in the United States as a Money Service Business with the United States Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN). Rn: 31000231722151.

Your transactions are secure and our facial verification and password encrypted platform, security and fraud monitoring tools keep your personal information safe.

content.2: Really great app for international transfers, with competitive rates as well.
content.3: its fine and easy to operate. very good 👍
content.5: A complete scam! I have £129 in my wallet and I can't use it. Nobody to talk to. zero support. Don't put your hard earned money here - you loose it
content.6: it is fast and simple to use
content.8: Simple, Fast and reliable exchange rates.
content.10: It been 2days now, the money I sent is still in progress and no one is providing updates or any information. There is no phone number to call, only chat. The issue is still not resolved after chatting with an agent. There is no option to cancel. This is very frustrating 😤
content.14: I recently made a transfer and it was reversed and up till now I have not received the money back to my wallet, this is a sad experience
content.15: nice and easy way to send money to your love ones
content.17: Some of my transactions delays which causes so many inconveniences and disappointment to me and recipients.
content.18: This is one of the most USELESS apps l have ever used, and l would NEVER recommend it to anyone. l used it to transfer money yesterday, and the transaction is still pending, and as a result, the receiver has not received the funds. l contacted support and was told the issue had been escalated for urgent attention. However, despite sending two follow-up messages, I have received no response. This level of service is unacceptable and shows a clear lack of respect for customers
content.19: Each time my money gets stuck, it often takes like forever for Pesa to resolve the concern.
content.21: Very poor app. I sent the money and the delay in processing was like 2 days
content.23: My transaction I've been pending for more than 3 days
content.24: 😤🔥Absolutely terrible experience. I deposited 330 AED into my account over 24 hours ago and till now there is NO payment processed and NO refund returned. My money is basically being held hostage. I contacted customer support and instead of resolving the issue, the so-called agent Adeola started asking personal and irrelevant questions about my family. This is beyond unprofessional and honestly disturbing.This platform feels extremely shady and raises serious red flags. Scam. it's Risky 🧐
content.26: a good fintech with good communication.i hope the challenges with USD transfers are sorted soon
content.27: There are customers saying and complaints that your services are shity and dis respectful, this is a sad way to start off as a business.
content.29: I don't recommend Pesaif you want to send money in dollars. I went through the verification process only to receive the following message: "the requested operation is not supported at this time". I feel like it was a waste of time and now my personal info is on this app.
content.30: I'm enjoying Pesa at the moment.
content.31: Your transfers are faster like air
content.32: Bad experience with Pesa. as I am talking, my transaction is still in process and the customer service is not giving me any assurance when the transaction will be processed or reverse. I regret using Pesa. Money that was supposed to solve an emergency problem is now lock my pesa.The wost thing is that they are not concern about my situation. 8000 Ghana cedis is not a joke
content.34: super faster than light speed , unlike some money transfer app that's annoying, simple ui , easy to understand and use xoxox
content.37: I regretted not knowing about this app on time. so easy and fast. I transferred money from my Nigerian bank account to Pesa from Pesa to Euro, and finally from Pesa to my Europe bank account.
content.38: Very slow for foreign transactions, very slow and useless customer service. I can't recommend.
content.39: Okay but the delay in processing and authenticating ID cards or other documents are too much.
content.42: honestly I was afraid to transact for the first time not knowing they were the best. I landed my euros from my Revolut to the Pesa app in a blink of an eye. what shocked me most was when converting the euros on the pesa app to my local currency was a real time transaction and my naira landed into my bank account in milliseconds. Best rate APP is user friendly. Customer service superb ( 24hrs ) and Transaction is in real time ( milliseconds ) ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
content.44: why cant we just send directly from our bank accounts . At least we should have that option
content.46: I needed to make a transaction and i habe to wait for 3 days for the money to get into my pesa account before I can transfer😬.
content.47: very slow processing time. transaction made since 7.50am this is 9.40am still pending.
content.50: fantastic and immediate service, highly impressive
content.51: Is a good app. And their rate is good. I gave four star because their app was not verify mr at firt. But now everything us wotking great
content.52: why does the money keep reversing back. it's so annoying
content.53: Brilliant app for forex transactions. Thank you
content.55: I sent money over 6 hours ago I'm yet to be credited Andy I need the money for my rent
content.56: I love this app. It's fast, very reliable and they have a superb customer service team to attend promptly to any question that arises. I am proud of your brand! Keep up the good work 👍👍👍
content.57: very slow...takes hours to get credited
content.60: Pesa tries to convince you with some good rate,but be prepared for some nerve-racking moments when you send money through them. they communicate poorly to you when your transaction is taking too long and you need someone to talk to, it's always like the person doesn't care about you after telling you they will escalate whatever. They make no provision for money to be reverted back into your account. my personal advice be careful when dealing with them. anything below even one star.
content.62: You guys are the best, Keep it up
content.63: Very fast and efficient. Pesa is the best
content.64: very easy to set up and use.
content.65: although there was some a lot of delays but the transaction was done.
content.66: They are good and serve the interests of legit funding for a safe fund.
content.68: very poor service after more than 3 to 4 hours of making transfer money into my bank account the money has not been delivered or deposited.
content.69: the exchange rate is too high
content.70: Fast and easy way to send money abroad
content.73: I got a notification that the transfer would take less than 10 minutes. I have been waiting for an hr .
content.75: guys pls try out pesa, I am super happy to have come across them, no capping, they are fast and reliable
content.79: I added money to my pesa wallet but cant make transfer. The money has been there for 2 days now. Each time I pit my transaction pin, it pops an error message. I just need my money back. I have used another app to send the money. I need my money back into my bank asap. Worst customer service, worst app, worst of the worst.
content.81: You will have to wait several minutes to chat with customer service. Transfer of funds also takes long
content.83: great app with very competitive exchange rate. It's difficult signing up but it's worth it
content.85: great, efficient and prompt service will advise everyone to patronize pesa at good rate💰💰
content.86: Great App! it's fast and reliable. If you have any issues, their Customer Service Team members are always willing and ready to help. I made a transfer from my Naira account to Pounds and when I hadn't gotten any alert, I complained to their Customer Service team on the App and I was assured that they were working on it and in less than 24 hours, I got the alert. I would definitely recommend using this App and at a great rate too 😊
content.88: The customer service are prompt in resolving any issues that arises. They have excellent service.
content.92: I like it but it takes forever for one funding to clear before you can add money to the account if you need to send another. tell me why money added to account since Friday isn't clear at almost 11pm on Monday and all I got was sorry, one transaction has to complete. can't use this app to send money in an emergency.
content.94: Very poor service. Customer service is really bad. No number to communicate with them.
content.95: Very fast and reliable app, we just have follow the right channels whenever our transaction delays, I initially felt the app wasn't good until I had a delayed transaction of 600 plus GBP and after sending an email accross to them, they responded swiftly with a call across to me and even before we finished talking on the phone I received alert of the over 600GBP transaction that was delayed
content.96: awesome and easy way of sending money to different countries
content.97: Pesa is not reliable on weekends. Do not send money to Africa using Pesa. Despite the fact that I explained to their customer service agent that I needed the money for my mother's surgery, they didn't take it seriously. Don't use them.
content.98: The app is so stressful and complicated, I am going ti deactivated my account. I can't go through this stress just to send money to a relative.
content.101: best app I have ever come across
content.102: fast, easy and smooth transactions . No hidden charges and very straight forward
content.103: sent money, said successful but money wasn't deposited to receiver.
content.104: The issue was resolved swiftly in-app. thank you 👍🏼
content.105: service is not good at all. no proper response at all.
content.106: My Experience With The App has not been ease. I made a transfer on Thurs and today's Tuesday evening my payment hasn't been received. Thus is unfair to customers like me. Worst app who milk innocent clients their earnings and wouldn't refund.
content.107: since on friday dis guys send money to my account 1,220,000 up till now i haven't received my money i call my bank to check they said the money is not in they system i email pesa pesa ask for my account statement which i send to them but no reply them dis pesa service is not good
content.108: Scam! becareful before you send money. I sent money on this app on 29 November 2025. As of December 7 2025, my family member did not receive the money and Customer service is HORRIBLE. Please DO NOT SEND MONEY with app unless you want to loose your money. SCAM APP. I'm sure they will be out of business soon with all this bad reviews. you have been warned! I only lost $50 but this review is to warn people out there. 😡
content.110: sometimes transaction will be delayed for some time
content.111: This transaction is time bound and it's still showing in progress. Not satisfied
content.112: a disaster of experience. money sent had been held for almost 5 days with no explanation 😕. i have had this account for over 2 years and did not understand the risk till now. that they can take your money and there will be no one to talk to or explain to you what exactly is going on. no number to call.. only vuage emails telling you they are investigating. please investigating what? the guys have 0 accountability and are totally not as safe as they make themselves to be.
content.113: the money did not deliver and did not return back this is very bad
content.115: Sent the money and still the transaction is in process after 24 hours of wait. They said it would only take maximum 1 hour to process the transaction. Still they said they are trying to resolve?? There should have been some service standards. On the top of that they just reply in chats. There is no phone call helpline. worst experience It's been now 2 plus days and no response from the team.
content.116: I got an email saying my transaction was successful but money never deliver to my account 5 days now
content.117: excellent. pesa make sending money faster. I will recommend it to others.
content.118: This is the worst app I have ever used. my transaction still showing "in progress" for the past 5 hours. The help service is not even helping at all. please stay away from this app. Especially for emergency transactions.
content.121: It's exactly same feature as nsave but better, you can transfer from GBP to your local bank, unlike nsave you have to convert to USD and conversions deals with FX Market time which you have to wait... Loving Pesa so far
content.122: I have not been able to get a help to make my transfer from my wallet account to someone l etend to make the transfer over 10 days now. All efforts has not been able to do with the option.
content.123: money could not be sent to Naira account immediately. this is affecting the purpose for use.
content.124: The Best, Fast and Efficient in Transactions...
content.125: surprise gift of 10 pounds. so excited. transaction too was smooth
content.127: There are usually delays in delivering when transacting on weekends
content.130: it is very very fast and realistic
content.134: this app is so frustrating, I sent my brother money since yesterday, it's been 20hrs now and the money is still in progress 😑 😐.
content.137: it's not work proper Even not received OTP
content.138: Absolutely good and reliable. Best rates so far. The local currency account is additional value. You can change and save to send later when the rate is high.
content.140: Easy to use and very secure.
content.142: Top notch service. Very clean and reliable
content.143: Funds tansferred to my GTBank account from Pesa is showing a status of "In Progess" for an unusually long time. Why?
content.145: Initially, I harbored some skepticism; however, my experience with Pesa has been so exceptional that it warrants a 10-star rating, if such an option were available.
content.146: I do not recommend weekend transaction, my honest review. my transfer has been "In Progress since 2pm in the afternoon and it's almost 8pm and transfer is still pending. I would have known better if I had read people's review🤦‍♀️. For urgent transfers please reconsider
content.147: transfer can be very fast some times but frustrating other times.
content.148: Most of the time. I have to chat operator/customer service before transaction is successful
content.149: Very poor system and I will never recommend it to anyone. I sent money to someone and the person never received the money after sending multiple mails and help lines They couldn't resolve the issue.
content.152: delays to make remittance when money is transferred to account. need to improve the time fame as when cash is urgently required, this is not your best stop.
content.153: if you are thinking of downloading this app, please don't try it. I'm crying right now as Im typing. they are not reliable as promised. money can be delayed for over 24 hours. All you can get is "we apologise..., we will escalate..." my child is stock in the middle of no where and needed money urgently, I transfer money and the payment status is still in progress. 3 days ago I transfer money and it took over 24 hours, same this month of november, I have experience 3 times delays. no refund..
content.154: I WANT TO BE AN AMBASSADOR TO PESA IN ITALY
content.156: Fast and reliable within two to three minutes delively
content.158: This is one of the most useless money transfer app I've ever seen. Sent money there twice, didn't delivered. Their customer Service is poor and impotent. They couldn't do anything. Lost money while trying to cancel the transaction. I would have given no star if it was possible because you deserve none.
content.159: pesa is exceptional among money sending apps and have the best rate ever
content.161: Money sent yesterday has still not been delivered. they don't have customer service number to call on the app. their live chat person has not responded my message from 7 hours ago even he was active an hour ago.
content.162: The app is swift and enjoyable
content.163: The best I have used so far.
content.164: Fast and easy. I have looked and looked for an app like this
content.165: it's my time using this app and I'm loving it already
content.166: Awesome, Happy now I can send money to my love ones
content.168: very bad especially during the weekends. they will just hold on to your funds and your transaction will be showing in progress most times until the weekends are over. i don't know why they have very poor and bad service for the weekends
content.176: bad experience with pesa , their transaction doesn't deserve on time 😪 😔 😤 😒
content.177: serious delay in sending money, you'll wait forever
content.178: Pesa isn't what it used to be. Asides the fact the exchange rate is not impressive as other apps I know, sending money to Nigeria is difficult for me. They end up reversing the money after hours . You guys should work on your system
content.179: One of the best digital banks out there.
content.180: i love Pesa so much, they are faster and better than most international mediums, they don't charge and their rate is just the best, I hope they don't change that
content.181: Excellent app. I used it from Nigeria to gift cash directly to an Indian bank account.. Awesome 💯
content.184: Pesa is so slow with transactions unlike before. Sent money in my local currency and yet to receive 👎They should work on instant transfers. I may not be able to use pesa to send money after today. it's really frustrating 😔
content.189: the transaction is still in progress 🤷‍♂️
content.193: Amazing App, very fast n reliable, keep it up...
content.196: pls I send cash and up till now it's under process and customer care are not responding
content.199: why do u force people to sign in before anything ? what if I sign-in and I don't like the App interface or the Navigation but u have my data already why ?

replyContent.39: Hello Solomon, We are sorry for the delay you experienced while verifying your account. These checks are part of our compliance requirements to keep all accounts secure, and we are continuously working to make the process faster and smoother. Your account has been verifed and we truly appreciate your feedback. Thank you.
replyContent.40:
Hello Onyinye,

We are glad that you enjoy our application. Thank you for the feedback. 😊
replyContent.41:
Hello Sen,
We are glad to hear you found Pesa swift and seamless. We remain committed to delivering a smooth and reliable experience every time. Thank you for the great feedback! 😊

Thank you for choosing Pesa.
replyContent.42:
Hi Temitope,
Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback. We’re thrilled to know your experience with real-time transactions, great rates, and our customer service met your expectations. Your support means a lot to us, and we’ll continue working to make Pesa even better.
replyContent.44:
Hello Mohammed,
With every new app version, we are introducing new features and improving existing ones. We aim to improve our services to meet your expectations. We are currently working on this feature. We appreciate your feedback.
replyContent.45:
Hi Elaine, Thank you for your feedback. We’re really sorry to hear about your experience. This is not the level of service we want for you.
Please kindly send us an email at support@pesa.co so we can look into this and assist you further.
replyContent.47: Hello Funke, Thank you for your feedback, and we’re sorry about the delay in completing your transaction. The delay was due to a downtime on the receiving bank which has been resolved,, and your transaction completed. We appreciate your patience.
replyContent.52:
Hi Vono, I am sorry to learn that your transactions were reversed. The reversals occurred due to issues with the receiving bank, and the funds were returned to your wallet. We recommend sending to another account to avoid delays.
We appreciate your feedback.
replyContent.54:
Hi Bonaventure,
Thank you so much for your encouraging 5 star rating.
replyContent.55:
Hi Joseph,
We’re really sorry for the delay and understand how stressful this was, especially for rent. The transaction was delayed by an issue with the recipient’s bank and has been returned to your wallet. Please try again or consider sending to another
account. Thank you for your patience.
replyContent.56:
Hi Cathrina,
Thank you so much. We’re thrilled to hear you love Pesa and find our service fast and reliable. Your kind words mean a lot, and we’ll keep working hard to maintain the experience you deserve. We appreciate your support.
replyContent.57:
Hi Oyetunde,
We apologise for the delay and know how inconvenient slow transactions can be. Please know we’re working to make credits faster and more reliable. Thank you for your support.
replyContent.58:
Hi Mobolaji,
Thank you. We’re glad you find Pesa easy and quick for transfers. We appreciate your support.
replyContent.59:
Hi Anthony,
Thank you very much for your feedback.
replyContent.60:
Hi Henry,
We’re really sorry for the stress this caused and understand how frustrating the delay and lack of clarity felt. This isn’t the experience we aim to provide. We’re glad to confirm the issue has now been resolved. Thank you for your patience and
for sharing your feedback, it helps us improve.
replyContent.61:
Hi Ugobest,
Thanks for taking out time to rate us. It really helps us to keep going and delivering the best. We appreciate your support.
replyContent.62:
Hello Damilola
We truly appreciate your support and are glad you had a great experience with us. We will keep doing our best.
Thank you for your feedback
replyContent.63:
Hi Godwin,
We’re delighted to hear that you found Pesa fast and efficient. We appreciate your feedback and support.
replyContent.64:
Hello Oluwasanmi,
We’re really glad to hear that you found the app easy to set up and use. Thank you for your feedback.
replyContent.65:
Hi Olaposi,
Thank you for your patience. We’re sorry about the delays you experienced, and we’re glad the transaction was eventually completed. We’re continuously working to make transfers faster and more reliable. We appreciate your feedback and support.
replyContent.66:
Hi John,
We’re sorry for the delay. Transfers can occasionally take longer due to processing checks, but we’re always working to improve turnaround times. Please reach out via in-app chat or support@pesa.co so we can review your transaction.
replyContent.67: Hi, thank you very much for your feedback.
replyContent.68: Hi Darlington, we’re really sorry about this experience. We know how frustrating it is when a transfer is delayed. Please email support@pesapeer.com with your contact details and transfer info so our team can investigate and resolve this as quickly as possible.
replyContent.69:
Thank you for providing your valuable feedback.
We boast of the best rates in the market today, if this is not the case ,
Please reach out to us at support@pesapeer.com for further clarity.
replyContent.70:
Hi Ben,
Thank you very much. We’re glad you find sending money abroad with Pesa fast and easy. We appreciate your support.
replyContent.71: We're always working hard to improve the app. Thanks for your download and feedback.
replyContent.73: Sorry to hear that! Could you write to us at support@pesapeer.com with more details of your issue? We'd love to help you troubleshoot.
replyContent.75: Hi! We are glad that you like our app. We'd very much appreciate if you have any recommendations/suggestions for us to get 5-star rating. Thank you very much.
replyContent.76: Thanks for taking out time to rate us. It really helps us to keep going and delivering the best :)
replyContent.77:
Thank you for your review. Enjoy reading & keep supporting us :)
If you have any feedback or suggestion, you could write to us at support@pesapeer.com. We would love to hear from you!
replyContent.78: Hi, we are sorry that you're having issues with the app. Can you write to us at support@pesapeer.com. Kindly include a description of the issue you are facing, your Android version, and your app version. We will investigate immediately & solve the issue.
replyContent.79:
Hi Uche,
We’re really sorry for how frustrating this has been, especially when you urgently needed your money. This is not the experience we want for you. Please reach out to us via our in-app chat or email support@pesa.co with your transaction
details, and we’ll urgently review the issue and assist with resolving it as quickly as possible.
replyContent.80:
Hi,
Happy to hear that you find the app good :)
Please let us know the reason behind this low rating at support@pesapeer.com. We'd be happy to improve our app based on your suggestions.
Thanks!
replyContent.81: Hi Funke, We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Your issue has been resolved. Sometimes, delays may occur due to the beneficiary bank, Our team is always working to improve our services for a smoother experience. If you need any assistance, please reach out to support@pesa.co.
replyContent.82:
Hi Ifeanyi,
Thank you. We’re glad you’re having a good experience with Pesa. We appreciate your support.
replyContent.83:
Hi Abdul,
Thank you. We’re glad you’re enjoying Pesa and our competitive rates. We appreciate your patience with the signup process and are always here to help if you need any support.
replyContent.84:
Hi Deji,
We’re sorry to hear you found Pesa a bit confusing. We’re always working to make the app easier to use. Please reach out via our in-app chat or support@pesa.co if you need any guidance, we’ll be happy to help.
replyContent.85:
Hi Sony,
We're always working hard to improve the app. Thanks for your download and feedback.
replyContent.86:
Hi Stellamaris,
Thank you so much for sharing this. We’re glad to hear you had a positive experience and that our team was able to support you through the delay. Your recommendation and kind words about our speed, rates, and customer service truly mean a lot to us 😊
replyContent.87:
Hi Ayo,
We’re happy to know Pesa is delivering the speed and value you expect. Thank you for choosing Pesa.
replyContent.88:
Hi Godwin,
We sincerely apologize for the slow processing times you’ve encountered. Your feedback is important, and we’d like to help. Please contact us through support@pesa.co or our in-app chat so we can review your transactions.
replyContent.89:
Hi Nate,

all_text: Best international transfer app good Really great app for international transfers, with competitive rates as well. its fine and easy to operate. very good 👍 good A complete scam! I have £129 in my wallet and I can't use it. Nobody to talk to. zero support. Don't put your hard earned money here - you loose it it is fast and simple to use seamless, excellent Simple, Fast and reliable exchange rates. Good services It been 2days now, the money I sent is still in progress and no one is providing updates or any information. There is no phone number to call, only chat. The issue is still not resolved after chatting with an agent. There is no option to cancel. This is very frustrating 😤 good Very bad experience. the best I recently made a transfer and it was reversed and up till now I have not received the money back to my wallet, this is a sad experience nice and easy way to send money to your love ones Great App ever Some of my transactions delays which causes so many inconveniences and disappointment to me and recipients. This is one of the most USELESS apps l have ever used, and l would NEVER recommend it to anyone. l used it to transfer money yesterday, and the transaction is still pending, and as a result, the receiver has not received the funds. l contacted support and was told the issue had been escalated for urgent attention. However, despite sending two follow-up messages, I have received no response. This level of service is unacceptable and shows a clear lack of respect for customers Each time my money gets stuck, it often takes like forever for Pesa to resolve the concern. nice Very poor app. I sent the money and the delay in processing was like 2 days super amazing My transaction I've been pending for more than 3 days 😤🔥Absolutely terrible experience. I deposited 330 AED into my account over 24 hours ago and till now there is NO payment processed and NO refund returned. My money is basically being held hostage. I contacted customer support and instead of resolving the issue, the so-called agent Adeola started asking personal and irrelevant questions about my family. This is beyond unprofessional and honestly disturbing.This platform feels extremely shady and raises serious red flags.
